Payment creation: Click on this link. Go to Tools > Setup > Basics > Create payment
Payment Successful: Payment is successful if you get an acknowledgement via an email. For more info, visit this link.
Add new fund and account details: To add a new fund and account details raise a request in this link with the approval from your immediate manager
Transaction id of payment: The transaction ID if the payment is successful could be found in Account tab under profile section of this link.
Cross country accounts: You can have same account accross countries in that case fxrate will be applied to local currency of country. For more info, visit this link.
Number of accounts: You can have multiple accounts across the country one for receive and one for deliver. For more info, visit this link.
